abstract: A bankruptcy trustee says he is engaged in talks with JPMorgan to turn over money belonging to MF Global customers that could be sitting at the bank.
snippet: A bankruptcy trustee says he is engaged in talks with JPMorgan to turn over money belonging to MF Global customers that could be sitting at the bank.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase is in talks with the authorities to turn over customer money that disappeared from MF Global when the firm went bankrupt last year.

headline.main: JPMorgan in Talks Over Missing MF Global Customer Money
